issue.title: Handful of test cases failing on Ubuntu 14.04

content.raw:
@ccrean you're not alone seeing test failures on Trusty. I've installed/compiled all of the optional dependencies/engines except ronn.

 These failures are mine (more or less on gazebo8 branch):


```

UNIT_BuildingEditor_TEST (OTHER_FAULT) (consumes all system memory and then gets killed by kernel)
UNIT_LaserVisualization_TEST (OTHER_FAULT) (segfault)
UNIT_LayersWidget_TEST (Timeout) (segfault)
UNIT_MainWindow_TEST (Timeout)
UNIT_ModelSnap_TEST (OTHER_FAULT) (segfault)
UNIT_Projection_TEST (Timeout) (segfault)
UNIT_GpuRaySensor_TEST (Failed) (no GPU)
INTEGRATION_factory (Failed) (one test fails for bullet)
INTEGRATION_gpu_laser (Failed) (no gpu)
INTEGRATION_model_editor (OTHER_FAULT) (one test fails)
```
content.html:
@ccrean you're not alone seeing test failures on Trusty. I've installed/compiled all of the optional dependencies/engines except ronn.

These failures are mine (more or less on gazebo8 branch):

UNIT_BuildingEditor_TEST (OTHER_FAULT) (consumes all system memory and then gets killed by kernel)
UNIT_LaserVisualization_TEST (OTHER_FAULT) (segfault)
UNIT_LayersWidget_TEST (Timeout) (segfault)
UNIT_MainWindow_TEST (Timeout)
UNIT_ModelSnap_TEST (OTHER_FAULT) (segfault)
UNIT_Projection_TEST (Timeout) (segfault)
UNIT_GpuRaySensor_TEST (Failed) (no GPU)
INTEGRATION_factory (Failed) (one test fails for bullet)
INTEGRATION_gpu_laser (Failed) (no gpu)
INTEGRATION_model_editor (OTHER_FAULT) (one test fails)
